trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH3SANANA_00496_SANANA_000_000<tab>Frankly, it's a relief to have a capable adventurer like you on board. As I said, we managed to salvage some supplies from the wreck. I can hook you up whatever you need─for a nominal fee, of course, hehe.
TEXT_REGOTH3SANANA_00496_SANANA_000_010<tab>Well, that turned complicated fast. And there I was pondering ways for the House to get a foot in Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato's doors...

TEXT_REGOTH3SANANA_00496_SANANA_000_020<tab>It all hinges on this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let's show that Jikkan what he's missing out on by shutting out the world. Hmmm, a sampling of the delights of Sanjo Hanamachi might not go astray...

TEXT_REGOTH3SANANA_00496_SANANA_000_030<tab>Right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let's see to it Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato has such a damned fine signature product, Jikkan won't have any room to complain!
TEXT_REGOTH3SANANA_00496_SANANA_000_040<tab>Keep up the good work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The House's coffers─er...I mean, Kurenai and her people are depending on you!
